brand_identity.name: atmytyp
brand_identity.voice: Professional but not stiff. Encouraging. Clear.

headings.usage: Use for all section titles and hero text. Don't be afraid of heavy weights.

body.usage: High legibility for features and pricing details.

mono.usage: Use for data metrics, pricing numbers, and 'code-like' aesthetic details.

grid_system.bento_features: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4 auto-rows-[300px] gap-6

buttons.primary: bg-orange-500 text-white hover:bg-orange-600 shadow-lg hover:shadow-orange-500/25 transition-all duration-300 rounded-full px-8 py-4 font-bold text-lg
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-orange-600 border-2 border-orange-100 hover:border-orange-200 hover:bg-orange-50 transition-all duration-300 rounded-full px-8 py-4 font-bold text-lg
buttons.ghost: text-slate-600 hover:text-orange-600 hover:bg-orange-50 rounded-full px-6 py-3 font-medium

cards.feature: bg-white border border-slate-100 shadow-sm hover:shadow-xl hover:-translate-y-1 transition-all duration-300 rounded-2xl p-8
cards.pricing_highlighted: bg-slate-900 text-white shadow-2xl scale-105 rounded-2xl p-8 border-2 border-orange-500 relative overflow-hidden
cards.pricing_standard: bg-white border border-slate-200 shadow-lg rounded-2xl p-8

navigation.style: fixed top-0 w-full z-50 bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md border-b border-slate-100/50

hero.visual: Combine 'dashboard_main' screenshot with 'hero_welcome' mascot peeking from behind it. Use floating 3D-style UI cards around them.

features_bento.layout: Tetris Grid. Mix large squares (spanning 2 cols) with small tall cards.
features_bento.style: Use 'feature_finance' and 'feature_ops' mascots as stickers on specific feature cards.

dashboard_preview.style: Macbook or Browser window frame style container. High elevation shadow.

pricing.layout: 3 Cards. Center card (Standard) is highlighted/dark mode.

employee_portal.style: Card-based layout showing 'Pay Slips', 'Leave Balance', 'Tax Info'.
employee_portal.visual: Clean, approachable, stress-free. Use 'office_team' image as a subtle backdrop or side image.

demo_booking.layout: Two column. Left: 'Why Book?' list. Right: Calendar Form.
demo_booking.style: Use Shadcn Calendar component. Make it look embedded and seamless.

instructions_to_main_agent.1: Use the provided Mascot URLs strictly. Do not use generic emoji icons.
instructions_to_main_agent.2: The primary color is Orange #F97316. Use it for Primary Buttons and Key Highlights. Do not overuse it for backgrounds (it causes eye fatigue).
instructions_to_main_agent.3: For the 'Book a Demo' form, use the Shadcn 'Calendar' and 'Form' components. Do not build a custom date picker.
instructions_to_main_agent.4: Ensure the Pricing Toggle works and switches the displayed prices.
instructions_to_main_agent.5: The Navigation Bar must be sticky and glassmorphic.
instructions_to_main_agent.6: Use the 'Manrope' font for Headings and 'Inter' for body. Import them from Google Fonts in index.css.
instructions_to_main_agent.7: Use 'lucide-react' for all functional icons (dashboard, users, chart, etc.).
instructions_to_main_agent.8: For the 'All-in-One' grid, ensure 'Finance', 'HR', 'Operations', and 'Data' are clearly visually distinct groups.
instructions_to_main_agent.9: Implement smooth scrolling for anchor links.
instructions_to_main_agent.10: ALL interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links) MUST have a unique `data-testid` attribute (e.g., `data-testid='hero-book-demo-btn'`).

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for dark colors.
Avoid centered layouts for heavy text.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical defaults.
Add micro-interactions (hover lift, scale) to all cards.
